title: Realistic tight-binding model for V2Se2O-family altermagnets
summary: Following earlier theoretical prediction, intercalated V2Se2O-family altermagnets such as RbV2Te2O and KV2Se2O have now been experimentally confirmed as d-wave altermagnets, representing the only known van der Waals layered altermagnetic systems. By combining crystal-symmetry-paired spin-momentum locking (CSML) with the layered structure, the V2Se2O-family offers a suitable platform for studying low-dimensional spintronic responses and exploring the interplay among multiple quantum degrees of freedom. To establish a concrete theoretical foundation for understanding and utilizing these materials, we investigate six representative members of the V2Se2O-family and construct a realistic tight-binding model parameterized by first-principles calculations, which is benchmarked by experimental measurements. This model accurately captures essential altermagnetic electronic properties, including CSML and noncollinear spin-conserved currents. It further incorporates strain-coupling parameters, enabling the simulation of strain-tunable responses such as the piezo-Hall effects. This realistic model allows systematic exploration of multiple degrees of freedom (like spin, valley, and layer) within a single system, and lays the groundwork for understanding their coupling with other quantum materials, such as topological insulators and superconductors, thereby advancing both the fundamental understanding and potential device applications of this novel class of layered altermagnets.

AI.tldr: 该研究为V2Se2O族反铁磁体建立了基于第一性原理计算的紧束缚模型，准确捕捉了其反铁磁电子特性，并模拟了应变可调响应，为理解这种新型层状反铁磁材料提供了理论基础。
AI.motivation: V2Se2O族材料是唯一已知的范德华层状反铁磁系统，结合了晶体对称性配对的自旋动量锁定和层状结构，为研究低维自旋电子学响应和多量子自由度相互作用提供了理想平台。需要建立具体的理论基础来理解和利用这些材料。
AI.method: 研究了V2Se2O族的六个代表性成员，通过第一性原理计算参数化构建了现实的紧束缚模型，并用实验测量进行了基准测试。该模型包含了应变耦合参数，能够模拟应变可调响应。
AI.result: 构建的模型准确捕捉了反铁磁电子特性，包括晶体对称性配对的自旋动量锁定和非共线自旋守恒电流。模型能够模拟应变可调响应如压电霍尔效应，并允许系统探索自旋、谷和层等多个自由度。
AI.conclusion: 该现实模型为理解V2Se2O族层状反铁磁体提供了理论基础，能够系统探索多个量子自由度，并为理解其与拓扑绝缘体、超导体等其他量子材料的耦合奠定了基础，推动了这类新型层状反铁磁体的基础理解和潜在器件应用。

title: Canonical strong coupling spin wave expansion of Kondo lattice magnets. II. Itinerant ferromagnets and topological magnon bands
comment: 12 pages; 8 figures; 1 appendix. Companion paper to arXiv:2408.16665
summary: In this paper we apply the canonical spin wave theory developed for itinerant Kondo lattice magnets in the strong coupling regime to Kondo ferromagnets, and address two general questions pertaining to their magnetic excitations. First, we compute corrections to the strong coupling (i.e., double-exchange) spin wave dispersion of itinerant ferromagnets. We show that the spin wave dispersion beyond the strong coupling limit can be mapped to the spin wave dispersion of a Heisenberg ferromagnet with farther neighbor exchange couplings, and discuss how this affects instabilities towards antiferromagnetism. Second, we examine the effect of including electronic spin-orbit coupling in the spin wave theory of Kondo ferromagnets. Including spin-orbit coupling is natural and straightforward in the formulation of the canonical spin wave expansion. Our key result is to demonstrate that the linear spin wave Hamiltonian of the itinerant Kondo ferromagnet can be mapped to the spin wave Hamiltonian of a Heisenberg ferromagnet with easy-axis Ising anisotropy and antisymmetric Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya exchange interaction. We show that in the case of the Kane-Mele honeycomb lattice Kondo ferromagnet this leads to topological magnon bands, and discuss the implications of this result for itinerant ferromagnets more broadly.

AI.tldr: 本文应用强耦合巡游近藤晶格磁体的规范自旋波理论到近藤铁磁体，研究其磁激发，包括强耦合极限修正和自旋轨道耦合效应，发现可映射到具有各向异性和DM相互作用的Heisenberg模型。
AI.motivation: 研究近藤铁磁体的磁激发特性，特别是超越强耦合极限的修正效应以及自旋轨道耦合对磁激发的影响，理解巡游铁磁体的拓扑性质。
AI.method: 应用强耦合巡游近藤晶格磁体的规范自旋波理论，计算强耦合极限（双交换）自旋波色散的修正，并将包含自旋轨道耦合的线性自旋波哈密顿量映射到具有各向异性和DM相互作用的Heisenberg模型。
AI.result: 1. 强耦合极限外的自旋波色散可映射到具有远邻交换耦合的Heisenberg铁磁体；2. 包含自旋轨道耦合的线性自旋波哈密顿量可映射到具有易轴Ising各向异性和反对称Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya交换相互作用的Heisenberg模型；3. 在Kane-Mele蜂窝晶格近藤铁磁体中产生拓扑磁子能带。
AI.conclusion: 近藤铁磁体的磁激发可通过规范自旋波理论有效描述，超越强耦合极限的修正和自旋轨道耦合效应导致可映射到扩展Heisenberg模型，为巡游铁磁体拓扑性质研究提供新视角。

title: Refined DFT recipe and renormalisation of band-edge parameters for electrons in monolayer MoS$_2$ informed by the measured spin-orbit splitting
summary: Conduction band-edge spin-orbit splitting (SOS) in monolayer transition metal dichalcogenides determines a competition between bright and dark excitons and sets conditions for spintronics applications of these semiconductors. Here, we report the SOS measurement for electrons in monolayer MoS$_2$, found from the threshold density, $n_*$, for the upper spin-orbit-split band population, which exceeds by an order of magnitude the values expected from the conventional density functional theory (DFT). Theoretically, half of the observed value can be attributed to the exchange enhancement of SOS in a finite-density electron gas, but explaining the rest requires refining the DFT approach. As the conduction band SOS in MoS$_2$ is set by a delicate balance between the contribution of sulphur $p_x$ and $p_y$ orbitals and $d_{z^2}-d_{xz}$ and $d_{z^2}-d_{yz}$ mixing in molybdenum, we use a DFT+U+V framework for fine-tuning the orbital composition of the relevant band-edge states. An optimised choice of Hubbard U/V parameters produces close agreement with the experimentally observed conduction band SOS in MoS$_2$, simultaneously resulting in the valence-band SOS and the quasi-particle band gap which are closer to their values established in the earlier-published experiments.

AI.tldr: 实验测量发现单层MoS₂导带自旋轨道劈裂比传统DFT预测大一个数量级，通过DFT+U+V框架优化参数可解释实验结果
AI.motivation: 单层过渡金属二硫化物中导带自旋轨道劈裂决定亮暗激子竞争，影响自旋电子学应用，但传统DFT预测与实验测量存在巨大差异
AI.method: 通过测量上自旋轨道劈裂带占据的阈值密度n*来实验确定SOS，理论使用DFT+U+V框架优化Hubbard U/V参数来微调带边态轨道组成
AI.result: 实验测得MoS₂导带SOS比传统DFT预测大一个数量级，其中一半可由交换增强解释，另一半需DFT+U+V优化参数才能与实验吻合
AI.conclusion: DFT+U+V框架通过优化Hubbard参数可准确描述MoS₂导带自旋轨道劈裂，同时改善价带SOS和准粒子带隙与实验的一致性

title: Competing magnetic states in a non-coplanar Kagome magnet
summary: Non-collinear Kagome antiferromagnets (AFMs) Mn3X (X = Sn, Ga, Ge, Ir, Pt) can generate an anomalous Hall effect (AHE) despite vanishing net magnetization, enabled by broken time-reversal and inversion symmetries. However, strong in-plane anisotropy has limited studies of the AFM-AHE and electronic applications to coplanar spin configurations. Non-coplanar spin textures in these systems have been realized only in low temperature spin-glass states or at interfaces with heavy metals. Here, we report an intrinsic non-coplanar spin configuration persisting up to 400 K in cubic-phase Mn3Ge, originating from coexisting symmetric and antisymmetric exchange interactions. Competing magnetic states associated with this non-coplanar spin configuration give rise to an unconventional AHE with a magnetic-field-induced sign reversal and a hump-like feature. Our findings establish a platform for non-coplanar magnetism in AFM spintronics.

AI.tldr: 在立方相Mn3Ge中发现了内在非共面自旋构型，可在高达400K下稳定存在，由对称和反对称交换相互作用共存引起，并产生具有磁场诱导符号反转的非常规反常霍尔效应。
AI.motivation: 非共线Kagome反铁磁体Mn3X虽然能在无净磁化情况下产生反常霍尔效应，但强面内各向异性限制了研究仅限于共面自旋构型。非共面自旋纹理通常只在低温自旋玻璃态或与重金属界面处实现，需要寻找能在高温下稳定的内在非共面自旋构型。
AI.method: 研究立方相Mn3Ge材料，分析其对称和反对称交换相互作用的共存效应，通过实验观测非共面自旋构型及其温度稳定性，测量反常霍尔效应对磁场的响应特性。
AI.result: 在立方相Mn3Ge中发现了内在非共面自旋构型，可在高达400K温度下稳定存在。这种构型源于对称和反对称交换相互作用的共存，产生了非常规反常霍尔效应，表现出磁场诱导的符号反转和驼峰状特征。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为反铁磁自旋电子学中的非共面磁性建立了一个新平台，立方相Mn3Ge中的内在非共面自旋构型及其产生的非常规反常霍尔效应为高温自旋电子器件应用提供了可能。

title: Simulating superconductivity in mixed-dimensional $t_\parallel$-${J}_\parallel$-${J}_\perp$ bilayers with neural quantum states
summary: Motivated by the recent discovery of superconductivity in the bilayer nickelate La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ (LNO) under pressure, we study a mixed-dimensional (mixD) bilayer $t_\parallel$-$J_\parallel$-$J_\perp$ model, which has been proposed as an effective low-energy description of LNO. Using neural quantum states (NQS), and in particular Gutzwiller-projected Hidden Fermion Pfaffian State, we access the ground-state properties on large lattices up to $8\times 8\times 2$ sites. We show that this model exhibits superconductivity across a wide range of dopings and couplings, and analyze the pairing behavior in detail. We identify a crossover from tightly bound, Bose-Einstein-condensed interlayer pairs at strong interlayer exchange to more spatially extended Bardeen-Cooper-Schrieffer-like pairs as the interlayer exchange is decreased. Furthermore, upon tuning the intralayer exchange, we observe a sharp transition from interlayer $s$-wave pairing to intralayer $d$-wave pairing, consistent with a first-order change in the pairing symmetry. We verify that our simulations are accurate by comparing with matrix product state simulations on coupled ladders. Our results represent the first simulation of a fermionic multi-orbital system with NQS, and provide the first evidence for superconductivity in two-dimensonal bilayers using high-precision numerics. These findings provide insight into superconductivity in bilayer nickelates and cold atom quantum simulation platforms.

AI.tldr: 使用神经网络量子态研究双层镍酸盐超导模型，发现从强层间耦合的紧束缚玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚对到弱耦合的BCS类对的交叉转变，以及从层间s波到层内d波配对的尖锐转变。
AI.motivation: 受高压下双层镍酸盐La₃Ni₂O₇超导性发现的启发，研究其有效低能描述模型，以理解该材料中的超导机制。
AI.method: 采用神经网络量子态方法，特别是Gutzwiller投影隐费米子Pfaffian态，在8×8×2格点上研究混合维度双层t∥-J∥-J⊥模型的基态性质。
AI.result: 模型在宽掺杂和耦合范围内表现出超导性；观察到从强层间交换的紧束缚玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚对到弱交换的扩展BCS类对的交叉转变；发现从层间s波配对到层内d波配对的尖锐一阶转变。
AI.conclusion: 这是首次用神经网络量子态模拟多轨道费米子系统，为二维双层超导性提供了首个高精度数值证据，对理解双层镍酸盐超导性和冷原子量子模拟平台具有重要意义。

title: Disentangling orbital and confinement contributions to $g$-factor in Ge/SiGe hole quantum dots
summary: Spin qubits are typically operated in the lowest orbital of a quantum dot to minimize interference from nearby states. In valence-band hole systems, strong spin-orbit coupling links spin and orbital degrees of freedom, strongly influencing the hole $g$-factor, a key parameter for qubit control. We investigate the out-of-plane $g$-factor in Ge quantum dots using excitation (single-particle) and addition (many-body) spectra. Excitation spectra allow us to distinguish the pure Zeeman $g$-factor from orbital contributions to the magnetic field splitting of states despite the strong spin-orbit coupling. This distinction clarifies discrepancies between $g$-factors extracted with the two methods, for different orbital states and different hole numbers. Furthermore, we find gate-tunability of $g$-factors at the level of 15%, highlighting its relevance for all-electric qubit manipulation.

AI.tldr: 通过激发谱和添加谱研究Ge量子点空穴的自旋轨道耦合对g因子的影响，区分纯塞曼g因子与轨道贡献，解释不同测量方法的差异，并展示15%的门电压可调性。
AI.motivation: 在价带空穴系统中，强自旋轨道耦合将自旋和轨道自由度联系起来，强烈影响空穴g因子这一量子比特控制的关键参数。传统测量方法在不同轨道态和空穴数下提取的g因子存在差异，需要澄清这些差异的来源。
AI.method: 使用激发谱（单粒子）和添加谱（多体）研究Ge量子点的面外g因子。激发谱允许区分纯塞曼g因子与轨道对磁场分裂的贡献，尽管存在强自旋轨道耦合。
AI.result: 成功区分了纯塞曼g因子与轨道贡献，澄清了两种方法提取g因子的差异。发现g因子具有15%的门电压可调性，这对于全电量子比特操控具有重要意义。
AI.conclusion: 通过激发谱方法可以准确提取空穴系统的纯塞曼g因子，解决了不同测量方法间的差异问题。g因子的显著门电压可调性为实现全电量子比特操控提供了重要途径。

title: Chiralometer: Direct Torque Detection of Crystal Chirality
summary: Chirality governs phenomena ranging from chemical reactions to the topology of quasiparticle charge carriers. However, a direct macroscopic probe for crystal chirality remains a significant challenge, especially in time reversal symmetric systems with weak circular dichroism signal. Here, we propose the ``Chiralometer'', a mechanical detection method that probes chirality by driving angular momentum carriers out of equilibrium. Using first-principles calculations and semiclassical transport theory, we demonstrate that a temperature gradient in insulators or an electric field in metals induces uncompensated angular momentum in phonons and electrons, respectively. This imbalance generates a macroscopic mechanical torque ($τ\sim 10^{-11} N \cdot m$) well within the sensitivity of modern torque magnetometry and cantilever-based sensors. We identify robust signatures in chiral crystals such as Te, SiO$_2$, and the topological semimetal CoSi. Our work establishes mechanical torque as a fundamental order parameter for chirality, offering a transformative tool for orbitronics and chiral quantum materials.

AI.tldr: 提出"手性计"机械检测方法，通过驱动角动量载流子非平衡态探测晶体手性，在绝缘体中用温度梯度、金属中用电场诱导非补偿角动量，产生可测量的宏观机械扭矩。
AI.motivation: 晶体手性在时间反演对称系统中难以直接宏观探测，特别是弱圆二色性信号的情况下，需要新的探测方法。
AI.method: 使用第一性原理计算和半经典输运理论，在绝缘体中通过温度梯度、在金属中通过电场诱导声子和电子的非补偿角动量，产生宏观机械扭矩。
AI.result: 预测机械扭矩可达10^{-11} N·m量级，在现代扭矩磁强计和悬臂传感器灵敏度范围内，在Te、SiO2、CoSi等手性晶体中识别出稳健特征。
AI.conclusion: 机械扭矩可作为手性的基本序参数，为轨道电子学和手性量子材料提供变革性工具。

title: Topologically Protected Surface Altermagnetism on Antiferromagnets
summary: Altermagnetism (AM) and its associated spin-transport phenomena are typically linked to spin-split electronic band structures in bulk materials. However, the crystal surface has a reduced symmetry with respect to the bulk, which can induce AM at the surface of conventional antiferromagnets (AFMs) -- a local effect which cannot be detected using bulk properties. In this work we define the symmetry conditions necessary for surface AM and show how it can be topologically protected, rendering it a robust effect. We provide a minimal model for one trivial and two topological examples of surface AM. We show that the spin spectral density, accessible by spin- and angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy, can exhibit a $d$-wave-like altermagnetic character at the surface, even when the full band structure is completely spin degenerate. Our topological model describes the Dirac semimetal CuMnAs, which provides an existing realization of our theory. Our results identify crystal surfaces as a platform to realize robust, topology- and symmetry-driven unconventional magnetism beyond the bulk classification of magnetic materials.

AI.tldr: 表面反铁磁体可产生拓扑保护的交替磁性，即使体材料完全自旋简并，表面仍能呈现d波状交替磁性特征
AI.motivation: 传统反铁磁体的晶体表面具有比体材料更低的对称性，这可能在表面诱导出交替磁性，这种局域效应无法通过体性质检测。研究表面交替磁性的对称性条件和拓扑保护机制，为超越体材料磁性分类提供新平台。
AI.method: 定义了表面交替磁性所需的对称性条件，展示了其拓扑保护机制。构建了一个平凡模型和两个拓扑模型作为表面交替磁性的最小模型示例。使用自旋和角分辨光电子能谱可探测的自旋谱密度进行分析。
AI.result: 即使完整的能带结构完全自旋简并，表面自旋谱密度仍能呈现d波状交替磁性特征。拓扑模型成功描述了狄拉克半金属CuMnAs，为理论提供了现有实现。表面交替磁性具有拓扑保护，是稳健的效应。
AI.conclusion: 晶体表面可作为实现稳健、拓扑和对称性驱动的非常规磁性的平台，超越了传统体材料磁性分类。表面交替磁性为探索超越体材料限制的磁性现象提供了新途径。

title: Cavity control of multiferroic order in single-layer NiI$_2$
comment: 14 pages, 4 figures. 3 pages supplemental materials and 2 extended figures
summary: Controlling materials through their interactions with electromagnetic vacuum fluctuations is an emergent frontier in material engineering. Although recent experiments have demonstrated dark cavity effects for electronic material phases, like superconductivity, ferroelectricity and charge density waves, a smoking gun experiment for magnetic systems is lacking. Largely, this comes from the focus on phase transitions, where a large critical light-matter coupling is needed to observe cavity modifications. Here, we propose spiral magnets, where even a small cavity-mediated change in magnetic interactions is reflected in a change of the spiral wavelength, as a promising platform to observe cavity effects. We focus on the single-layer multiferroic NiI$_2$, interacting with electric field fluctuations from surface phonon polaritons of the paraelectric substrate SrTiO$_3$. With decreasing substrate-material distance, the ratio of nearest and third nearest neighbor exchange interactions reduces, leading to an increase of the spiral wavelength and an eventual transition into a ferromagnetic state. Our work identifies a realistic platform to observe cavity vacuum renormalization effects in magnetic systems.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出利用螺旋磁体作为观测腔体效应在磁性系统中的平台，通过NiI₂与SrTiO₃表面声子极化激元的相互作用，展示腔体真空涨落对磁相互作用和螺旋波长的可调性。
AI.motivation: 虽然已有实验证明暗腔效应对电子材料相变（如超导、铁电、电荷密度波）的影响，但磁性系统仍缺乏确凿的实验证据。这主要是因为相变需要较大的临界光-物质耦合才能观测到腔体修饰效应。
AI.method: 提出以螺旋磁体为平台，聚焦单层多铁材料NiI₂与铁电衬底SrTiO₃表面声子极化激元的电场涨落相互作用。通过减小衬底-材料距离，研究最近邻和第三近邻交换相互作用比例的变化对螺旋波长的影响。
AI.result: 随着衬底-材料距离减小，最近邻与第三近邻交换相互作用比例降低，导致螺旋波长增加，并最终实现向铁磁态的转变。这为观测磁性系统中的腔体真空重整化效应提供了现实平台。
AI.conclusion: 螺旋磁体是观测腔体效应在磁性系统中的理想平台，即使很小的腔体介导的磁相互作用变化也会反映在螺旋波长的变化上，为磁性材料工程提供了新的调控途径。

title: High Photovoltaic Efficiency in Bulk-Stacked One-Dimensional GeSe$_{2}$ van der Waals Crystal
summary: Germanium diselenide (GeSe$_{2}$) has recently attracted substantial interest as a rare example of one-dimensional (1D) van der Waals material. Here, we investigate the photovoltaic potential of bulk-stacked GeSe$_{2}$ chains using first-principles calculations within the $GW0$ approximation and the Bethe-Salpeter equation (BSE) to capture quasiparticle and excitonic effects. The bulk GeSe$_{2}$ exhibits indirect GW band gaps of 1.92 eV (type-I) and 1.08 eV (type-II). Optical calculations show markedly stronger visible-light absorption in type-II, yielding a spectroscopically limited maximum efficiency (SLME) of ~25.6% at a 0.5 $μ$m thickness. Phonon and room-temperature ab initio molecular dynamics analyses indicate that type-II is dynamically stable, whereas type-I shows imaginary phonon modes, suggesting a propensity for structural distortion. These results identify type-II GeSe2 as a promising stable absorber for thin-film photovoltaics with enhanced flexibility compared to typical 2D vdW systems.

AI.tldr: GeSe₂作为一维范德华材料，其type-II相具有优异的光伏性能，在0.5μm厚度下理论效率达25.6%，且结构稳定，适合薄膜光伏应用。
AI.motivation: 研究GeSe₂这种一维范德华材料的光伏潜力，探索其作为薄膜光伏吸收材料的可能性，并与传统二维范德华材料进行比较。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理计算，包括GW0近似和Bethe-Salpeter方程，考虑准粒子和激子效应；进行声子分析和室温分子动力学模拟评估结构稳定性。
AI.result: type-II GeSe₂具有1.08 eV间接带隙，可见光吸收显著增强，在0.5μm厚度下理论效率达25.6%；结构动力学稳定；type-I相存在虚声子模式，结构不稳定。
AI.conclusion: type-II GeSe₂是一种有前景的稳定光伏吸收材料，相比典型二维范德华系统具有更好的柔性，适合薄膜光伏应用。

title: Microstructural origin of the simultaneous enhancements in strength and ductility of a nitrogen-doped high-entropy alloy
summary: As one of the most abundant interstitial elements, nitrogen (N) is effective in improving yield strength of metallic materials, due to interstitial solid solution strengthening. Doping N can substantially enhance the yield strength but often leads to a decreased ductility, revealing a strength-ductility trade-off phenomenon. Here, we simultaneously enhance the strength and ductility in a non-equiatomic CrMnFeCoNi high-entropy alloy via N alloying and unravel the underlying microscopic mechanisms. The N-doped alloy (1 at.% N) shows an excellent combination of higher yield strength (104% increase) and larger ductility (38% increase), with a two-stage strain hardening behavior, compared to the N-free alloy. Detailed transmission electron microscopy (TEM) analysis reveals that N-doping introduces short-range order (SRO) domains within the microstructure, leads to pronounced planar slip, and promotes the formation of nano-spaced (6-15 nm) stacking faults and deformation twins. Continuous generation and interaction of the fine-spaced SFs act as a strong barrier for dislocation movement and provide ample room for dislocation storage. The interaction of SRO with dislocations and the evolution of SFs ascribe to the first strain hardening stage, and the disordering of the SRO along with the activation of deformation twins are attributed to the second strain hardening stage. Our work shows that N-doping is effective in simultaneously improving the strength-ductility synergy and provides novel insights into alloy design with slightly elevating the SFE, and manipulating the ordered structure within the HEA.

AI.tldr: 通过氮掺杂在非等原子CrMnFeCoNi高熵合金中同时提高强度和塑性，揭示了短程有序域和纳米间距堆垛层错的关键作用
AI.motivation: 氮作为间隙元素能有效提高金属材料的屈服强度，但通常会导致塑性下降，出现强度-塑性权衡现象。研究旨在探索如何通过氮合金化同时提高高熵合金的强度和塑性
AI.method: 在非等原子CrMnFeCoNi高熵合金中掺杂1 at.%的氮，通过透射电子显微镜详细分析微观结构变化，研究氮掺杂引入的短程有序域、平面滑移、纳米间距堆垛层错和变形孪晶的形成机制
AI.result: 氮掺杂合金相比无氮合金，屈服强度提高104%，塑性提高38%，表现出两阶段应变硬化行为。氮掺杂引入了短程有序域，导致明显的平面滑移，促进形成6-15 nm间距的堆垛层错和变形孪晶
AI.conclusion: 氮掺杂能有效同时提高强度-塑性协同效应，为通过略微提高堆垛层错能和调控有序结构来设计高熵合金提供了新见解

title: Pressure dependent topological, superconducting, optoelectronic and thermophysical properties of Ta2Se chalcogenide: Theoretical insights
summary: Tetragonal Ta2Se is a layered, Ta-rich chalcogenide that departs from conventional MX2 transition-metal dichalcogenides by hosting dense Ta-Ta networks capped by Se square-net layers. Here, we present a unified first-principles investigation of hydrostatic-pressure tuning in Ta2Se from 0 to 10 GPa, connecting the structural response, mechanical stability, thermophysical indicators, bonding evolution, electronic and optical behavior, lattice dynamics and superconductivity within a single framework. The derived thermophysical descriptors corroborate a pressure-stiffened lattice: density increases, Debye temperature rises, melting temperature is elevated and minimum thermal conductivity increases, whereas the Grüneisen parameter remains within a narrow window, suggesting no anomalous anharmonic softening. Bond population metrics and electron-density-difference analysis revealed a mixed metallic-covalent bonding picture dominated by a robust Ta-Ta metallic backbone, accompanied by pressure-strengthened Ta-Se hybridization. Electronic-structure calculations show persistent metallicity under compression; pressure broadens bands, reduces density of states at the Fermi level, reshapes the Fermi surface and points to a possible Lifshitz-type reconstruction without symmetry breaking. The optical response remained metallic with Drude-like low-energy behavior and pressure-tunable spectral features. The phonon dispersions exhibit no imaginary modes, confirming dynamical stability. Electron-phonon coupling calculations classify Ta2Se as a weak-coupling, phonon-mediated superconductor with Tc around 3.9 K, consistent with available experiments and establish pressure as a practical control knob for stability and superconductivity-relevant descriptors in this metal-rich layered platform.

AI.tldr: 论文通过第一性原理研究Ta2Se在0-10 GPa压力下的性质变化，发现压力增强晶格稳定性、改变电子结构和光学响应，并证实其为弱耦合超导体(Tc~3.9K)。
AI.motivation: 研究富钽层状硫族化物Ta2Se在压力调控下的性质变化，探索其与传统MX2过渡金属二硫化物的差异，为理解金属富集层状平台的稳定性和超导性提供统一框架。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理计算方法，在0-10 GPa静水压力范围内系统研究Ta2Se的结构响应、力学稳定性、热物理指标、键合演化、电子光学行为、晶格动力学和超导性。
AI.result: 压力使晶格硬化：密度增加、德拜温度升高、熔点提升、最小热导率增加；电子结构保持金属性，费米面可能发生Lifshitz型重构；光学响应保持金属特征；声子色散无虚频；电子-声子耦合计算显示其为弱耦合超导体，Tc约3.9K。
AI.conclusion: Ta2Se是具有稳健Ta-Ta金属骨架的层状材料，压力可有效调控其稳定性和超导相关参数，为金属富集层状平台的可控设计提供了理论依据。

title: MoireStudio: A Universal Twisted Electronic Structure Calculation Package
summary: Twistronics is an emerging and captivating field in condensed matter physics and material science. However, accurately and efficiently calculating the electronic structures of twisted systems remains a significant challenge. To address this, we have developed MoireStudio, a universal Python-based computational package for twisted electronic structures. Its functionalities include commensurate structure search, structure generation, parameterization, and construction for tight-binding models and continuum models, and the precise incorporation of full relaxation effects. The package is applicable to arbitrary combinations of two-dimensional materials, including rectangular lattices and heterostructures. User-friendly and easy to use, MoireStudio supports parallel large-scale computations, provides visualization capabilities, and offers interfaces with third-party software. It is poised to become a convenient and powerful tool for researchers in twistronics fields.

AI.tldr: 开发了MoireStudio，一个通用的Python计算包，用于准确高效地计算扭曲系统的电子结构。
AI.motivation: 扭曲电子学是一个新兴领域，但准确高效地计算扭曲系统的电子结构仍然是一个重大挑战。
AI.method: 开发了MoireStudio，一个Python包，包含可公度结构搜索、结构生成、参数化、紧束缚模型和连续模型构建，以及精确纳入完全弛豫效应等功能。
AI.result: MoireStudio适用于任意二维材料组合（包括矩形晶格和异质结构），支持并行大规模计算、可视化功能，并提供第三方软件接口。
AI.conclusion: MoireStudio将成为扭曲电子学领域研究人员方便而强大的工具。

title: Multiple Layer-Selective Polar Charge Density Waves in ${\rm{EuTe}}_{4}$
summary: ${\rm{EuTe}}_{4}$ is a polar charge density wave (CDW) material, with giant thermal hysteresis and non-volatile state switching under electric and optical fields, attracting great attention in recent years. However, the in-depth understanding of these anomalous phenomena remains elusive. Herein, via first-principles calculations, we reveal that the polar CDW state in ${\rm{EuTe}}_{4}$ hosts a novel layer-selective nature, wherein multiple energetically close CDW configurations coexist and exhibit low interconversion energy barriers. Monte Carlo simulations indicate that the giant thermal hysteresis in ${\rm{EuTe}}_{4}$ originates from a phase transition mainly driven by the change of configurational entropy, around which the material hosts a metastable CDW state characterized by diverse local polar configurations breaking the out-of-plane translational symmetry. The configurational composition of this metastable CDW state can be effectively controlled by electric and optical fields, thereby enabling non-volatile state switching. Our theoretical findings align well with recent experimental observations in ${\rm{EuTe}}_{4}$ and pave the way for exploring the emerging phenomena and applications of polar CDW in multilayered systems.

AI.tldr: EuTe4的极性电荷密度波态具有层选择性特征，多重能量相近的CDW构型共存且转换能垒低，其巨大热滞回线源于构型熵驱动的相变，电/光场可调控该亚稳态实现非易失性开关。
AI.motivation: EuTe4作为极性电荷密度波材料，表现出巨大的热滞回线以及在电/光场下的非易失性状态切换，但这些异常现象的深层机制尚不清楚，需要从理论上深入理解。
AI.method: 通过第一性原理计算揭示EuTe4中极性CDW态的层选择性特征，结合蒙特卡洛模拟研究热滞回线起源，分析电/光场对亚稳态CDW构型组成的调控机制。
AI.result: 发现EuTe4的极性CDW态具有层选择性，多重能量相近的CDW构型共存且转换能垒低；巨大热滞回线源于构型熵驱动的相变，材料在该相变点附近存在由多种局域极性构型组成的亚稳态CDW态；电/光场可有效调控该亚稳态的构型组成，实现非易失性状态切换。
AI.conclusion: 理论结果与EuTe4的实验观测一致，揭示了极性CDW材料中热滞回线和非易失性开关的微观机制，为探索多层系统中极性CDW的新现象和应用开辟了道路。

title: Giant thermopower changes related to the resistivity maximum and colossal magnetoresistance in EuCd2P2
summary: We present the thermopower of EuCd2P2, a material which exhibits a large resistivity peak with significant magnetic field dependence in the temperature range of 10-25 K. In the same region we observe a highly unusual behavior of the thermopower with two sign changes and giant extrema. The overall variation of the thermopower exceeds 4 000 muV/K and takes place in an extremely narrow temperature region of less than 5 K. The anomaly is suppressed completely in a small magnetic field of 0.5 T. We discuss this observation using a simple drift-diffusion picture and taking into account that the temperature gradient inducing the thermopower voltage is accompanied by a gradient of the electrical resistivity. Our simple estimation yields the correct magnitude, shape, and field dependence of the thermopower anomaly observed in EuCd2P2. These results open a new route to giant thermopower values via gradients of electronic properties.

AI.tldr: EuCd2P2材料在10-25K温度区间展现出异常巨大的热电效应，变化幅度超过4000 μV/K，在小于5K的窄温区内发生两次符号反转，且能被0.5T小磁场完全抑制。
AI.motivation: 研究EuCd2P2材料中观察到的异常巨大热电效应现象，该效应在窄温区内展现出前所未有的幅度和复杂行为，为理解热电效应的物理机制和开发新型热电材料提供新思路。
AI.method: 采用简单的漂移-扩散模型进行分析，同时考虑温度梯度引起的热电电压以及伴随的电导率梯度效应，通过理论估算来解释实验观察到的热电异常现象。
AI.result: 在EuCd2P2材料中观测到超过4000 μV/K的巨大热电效应变化，该变化在小于5K的窄温区内发生，呈现两个符号反转的极端值，且能被0.5T小磁场完全抑制。理论估算能够正确预测热电异常的幅度、形状和磁场依赖性。
AI.conclusion: 通过电子性质梯度实现巨大热电效应是一条新途径，EuCd2P2中的异常热电行为为开发高性能热电材料提供了新的物理机制和研究方向。

title: Exciton fine structure in CdSe nanoplatelets using a quasi-2D screened configuration-interaction framework
summary: We compute exciton binding energies and fine-structure splittings in CdSe nanoplatelets with two zincblende geometries and one wurtzite geometry, finding that the wurtzite structure exhibits the largest bright-bright splitting due to its intrinsic in-plane anisotropy, while the zincblende structures show smaller but finite splittings arising from atomistic symmetry breaking at edges and corners. These results are obtained using a theoretical framework that we developed, which combines DFT single-particle states with screened configuration interaction, a quasi-2D dielectric screening model, and an efficient Coulomb-cutoff scheme that eliminates periodic-image interactions and enables accurate Coulomb and exchange integrals at low computational cost. This methodology provides a transferable and practical route for studying excitons in CdSe nanoplatelets and other quasi-two-dimensional nanomaterials.

AI.tldr: 计算CdSe纳米片不同晶体结构（两种闪锌矿和一种纤锌矿）的激子结合能和精细结构分裂，发现纤锌矿结构由于本征面内各向异性具有最大的亮-亮分裂，而闪锌矿结构由于边缘和角落的原子对称性破缺表现出较小但有限的分裂。
AI.motivation: 研究CdSe纳米片中不同晶体结构对激子性质的影响，特别是精细结构分裂，这对于理解这些准二维纳米材料的光学性质和应用潜力至关重要。
AI.method: 开发了一个理论框架，结合DFT单粒子态与屏蔽构型相互作用，使用准二维介电屏蔽模型和高效的库仑截断方案，消除了周期性镜像相互作用，以低计算成本准确计算库仑和交换积分。
AI.result: 纤锌矿结构由于本征面内各向异性表现出最大的亮-亮分裂，而闪锌矿结构由于边缘和角落的原子对称性破缺显示出较小但有限的分裂。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为研究CdSe纳米片和其他准二维纳米材料中的激子提供了一种可转移且实用的途径。

title: Multiscale Modeling of Metal/Oxide/Metal Conductive Bridging Random Access Memory Cells: from Ab Initio to Finite Element Calculations
summary: We present a multiscale simulation framework to compute the current vs. voltage (I-V ) characteristics of metal/oxide/metal structures building the core of conductive bridging random access memory (CBRAM) cells and to shed light on their resistance switching properties. The approach relies on a finite element model whose input material parameters are extracted either from ab initio or from machine-learned empirical calculations. The applied techniques range from molecular dynamics and nudged elastic band to electronic and thermal quantum transport. Such an approach drastically reduces the number of fitting parameters needed and makes the resulting modeling environment more accurate than traditional ones. The developed computational framework is then applied to the investigation of an Ag/a-SiO2/Pt CBRAM, reproducing experimental data very well. Moreover, the relevance of Joule heating is assessed by considering various cell geometries. It is found that self-heating manifests itself in devices with thin conductive filaments with few-nanometer diameters and at current concentrations in the 10s-microampere range. With the proposed methodology it is now possible to explore the potential of not-yet fabricated memory cells and to reliably optimize their design.

AI.tldr: 提出多尺度模拟框架计算CBRAM的I-V特性，结合第一性原理和机器学习参数，减少拟合参数，提高准确性，应用于Ag/a-SiO2/Pt器件并评估焦耳热效应。
AI.motivation: 传统CBRAM建模需要大量拟合参数，准确性有限。需要开发更精确的多尺度模拟方法来理解电阻开关特性，并探索未制造器件的潜力。
AI.method: 建立有限元模型，输入参数来自第一性原理计算或机器学习经验计算。结合分子动力学、弹性带方法、电子和热量子输运等多尺度技术。
AI.result: 成功应用于Ag/a-SiO2/Pt CBRAM，很好再现实验数据。发现焦耳热效应在直径几纳米的细导电丝和数十微安电流范围内显著。减少拟合参数，提高准确性。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能可靠优化CBRAM设计，探索未制造器件的潜力，为电阻开关机制提供深入理解，是多尺度模拟在纳米电子器件中的重要应用。
